name: Convenience Catastrophe
description:
After not returning his shopping cart for the hundredth time,  Daryl is cursed with crippling hunger by the store manager. Every ten seconds he losses half his health, but if he's able to keep eating, he'll survive. Unfortunately for him, this is no ordinary convenience store, he's gonna have to fight if he wants anything to eat.

Controls

WASD- to move

Left Click- to attack 

Space- to jump

Made in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 51
